channel.title: Sloan on Stats On the T
channel.description: Recent content in Sloan on Stats On the T

item.title: Research Highlights from 2018 MIT Sloan Analytics Conference
item.description: This week the MIT Sloan Analytics Conference will showcase some of the cutting-edge research happening in sports statistics. What do the themes from this year suggest about the state-of-the-art in quantitative work in sport?
